name: Be An Ant And Eat Six Scrumptious Pastries
name_original: Be An Ant And Eat Six Scrumptious Pastries
description: Ever wanted to be an ant and eat six specific pastries? See that dream realized in this hyperrealistic simulation project. BECOME the ant and EAT the pastries. Chomp down on a variety of pastries as an ant. Ant eat pastry.
